column2: minus 1 star for ridiculous service policies and insistent arguing with customers who weren't asking for anything the restaurant doesn't normally do
column3: and minus 1 star for the combo of lack of parking
column4: making people wait outside in cold weather (when clearly next door was open and being used by staff)
column5: with no real heating (crowding around the one heat lamp only barely heated the tops of our heads)
column6: and being so small that with one person before you it still takes 30 minutes to get a table.
